extendedInfo.description: This Android app contains 50 detailed No-Limit Hold âem scenarios designed to improve your play and make you more money. This app takes you through challenging scenarios using game theory, hand analysis and stats.  Your satisfaction is important to us and we have a no questions asked refund policy for all our Android apps. We encourage you to try our application out risk free and let us know by e-mailing info@upwardpro.com if there are any issues.Written and edited by tournament winning experts, this app is perfect for the plane ride to Vegas.

reviews.comment: Cool idea, no graphical representation other than only the cards. Sometimes unclear.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad job
reviews.comment: It has only 50 questions/situations never been updated, some of the answers are nice but a couple of them are mistakes and easily proved.. Further more there are many mistakes like stack sizes or missing cards etc.. Nice concept bad result
reviews.author: Nick Domestinis

reviews.comment: Pretty good. Seems to be all tournament situations, would be better to add cash game strategies too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love the scenarios, and the explanations for the test answers are very insightful. With deeper analysis of user test results it would be killer!!
reviews.author: A Google User
